text: @BenJKest HELL NO! Texas Governor @GregAbbott_TX refuses to mandate a shelter in place order—while prohibiting abortion services during this crisis. Texas Lt. Governor @DanPatrick is all in for killing off the elderly for the sake of the economy. https://t.co/9NMODfgR3a
